ModulePrefs.title: Page Refresher
ModulePrefs.description: Make your page update itself automatically
ModulePrefs.author: Séamus Ó Ceanainn

UserPref.name: Timeout
UserPref.display_name: Please enter the number of seconds between each refresh (minimum 5 seconds)

Module.Content:
<body>
	</body>
	<script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.0.0.min.js"></script>
	<style>
	</style>
	 
	 	<script type="text/javascript"> 
				// Get userprefs 
				var prefs = new gadgets.Prefs(); 
							
				function refresher() {
					var params = {};  
					params[gadgets.io.RequestParameters.CONTENT_TYPE] = gadgets.io.ContentType.TEXT;  
					var timeout = prefs.getInt("Timeout");
					if (timeout < 5) timeout = 5;
					setTimeout(function (){
						window.location.reload(true);
					}, timeout *1000);
				};
				
				gadgets.util.registerOnLoadHandler(refresher);
		</script>
